text: Mumbra is a town in Thane district in the state of Maharashtra, India. As per the 2011 census, The population of Mumbra was more than 900,000 with around 80% Muslims. It is India's largest Muslim locality also known by India's largest Muslim Ghetto. ==Related pages== * Mumbra Devi temple * 1993 Bombay bombings *Islam in India ==References== Category:Cities in Maharashtra
title: Mumbra
